charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] caught a whiff
of a strong scent carried by the ocean
breeze.
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1101_0200_:
And when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found where it was coming
from...
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0400_:
We’ve been training here. Are you here to
train too?
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0500_: Hm? A strong smell led you here?
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0600_: I bet it was my Aromatisse!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0700_:
Aromatisse’s scent has always been unique,
even back when she was a Spritzee!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0800_: When she evolved, it got even stronger.
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_0900_:
Some people aren’t huge fans of
Aromatisse’s scents, though...
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1000_:
So when we train, I try to pick spots that
aren’t too crowded. That way, her scents
don’t overwhelm.
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1100_:
I looked up to Valerie, so I kinda just kept
the momentum going and became her
apprentice.
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1200_:
That’s why I have to keep working on my
designs and Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1300_:
Compared to everyone else at Laverre Gym,
I don’t think I have anything I can be truly
proud of...
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1400_:
So I plan to do my best until I figure out
what MY thing will be!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_0401_1600_: Thanks! I’ll keep training until I do!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_0302_1700_: I could be your training partner!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_1900_:
I hope if I brush up on my skills with
Aromatisse, I can become the person I’ve
always wanted to be!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_2200_:
but we can use that to our advantage
in battle!
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_2300_:
Isn’t it interesting how something can work
either for or against you depending on the
situation?
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_2400_:
I’ll keep working on turning my weaknesses
into strengths. Then, I’ll find something only
I can do...
charaepi_ch0363_00_asami/2301_1201_2500_:
and show everyone I can master being a
Pokémon Trainer AND a fashion designer!
